message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you coming down to $90, but I'm looking to pay closer to $85.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to pay a bit lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $87.50. It's a great compromise that I think you'll find reasonable.
